title: 126. Q&A Part 3: Confidence, The Universe & Finding Your Purpose
itunes:title: 126. Q&A Part 3: Confidence, The Universe & Finding Your Purpose
description:
How do you forgive someone who has harmed you? On today's Q&A episode, Andy explains how the energy you put out into the universe comes back to you, the difference between cockiness and confidence and how to make the transition from "nothing to lose" to "something is at stake" in your entrepreneurship journey.

LINKS MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE:

  • Book Andy to Be on Your Podcast
  • Follow Andy on Instagram
  • Follow Andy on Facebook
  • Take complete control of your life - 75 HARD
  • Get my raw & uncensored advice about success & life delivered to you daily!
